metadata.name: Always - Twinny Twin feat. Jaii.Reynolds
metadata.description:
"Always" is more than just a song; it's a tribute to the people who matter most in our lives. 

The collaboration between two best friends, singer-songwriter, and talented videographer, Jaii.Reynolds and  Twinny Twin is a testament to the power of friendship and the creative synergy that comes from working together. Jaii's smooth and soulful vocals are perfectly complemented by the energetic and upbeat instrumental track, creating a sound that's both fun and deeply moving.

But it's the heartfelt message of the song that truly resonates. Dedicated to the friends, family, and loved ones who are always there for us, "Always" celebrates the unconditional love and support that we receive from those closest to us. The lyrics speak to the bonds that we share with the people who know us best, and the comfort and strength that we draw from those relationships.

As the song builds to its final chorus, I hope you find yourself swept up in the joy of the moment. Whether you're dancing in a club or singing along with your loved ones at home, "Always" is a song that will lift your spirits and remind you of the incredible power of human connection. So turn up the volume, and let the music take you on a journey of love, friendship, and endless possibilities. Thank you for tuning in. 

-Twinny
